content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content:
Hello Emilia,

I am glad you found the apartment to your liking. We can talk about the rental price. However, I must remind you that I am not obligated to reveal the apartment's details, as it is stated above. 

Remember, if we agree on a price, I will respond with 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' If I don't want to continue the negotiation, I will give a reason. If we do not agree on a price, the negotiation will be terminated with 'TERMINATE'.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
